info.title: Store App API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for your Store App

get.summary: Show form to create a new product
Show form to create a new supplier

post.summary: Authenticate user for both Web and API access
post.description: Handles web-based login with redirects and API-based login that returns a token.

200.description: Login successful - Web users are redirected, API users receive a token

post.summary: Log out the authenticated API user
post.description: Invalidates all tokens for the currently authenticated user.

get.summary: Get the cart items for the authenticated user

post.description: Add a new category to the system.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific category by ID.

put.description: Update details of an existing category.

delete.description: Remove a category from the system.

get.summary: Get all products for a specific category

200.description: List of products for the given category

get.summary: Get list of favorite products for authenticated user
Show the form for creating a new resource

created_at.description: Timestamp when the category was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the category was last updated
